channel.title: Monochrome & looping
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Monochrome & looping" - Does anything loop?

item.title: Re: Monochrome & looping
item.content:encoded: Dark Band loops, and that means you can create a monochrome moon right at the beginning of the next season. In addition, the final part of the monochrome missions gives you a bloodline ability and a new theme. The theme really only works for Kage, but the bloodline ability are pretty amazing, and they loop.

item.title: Monochrome & looping
item.content:encoded: Has anyone gotten to the point where they've been able to determine if any of the monochrome items loop? I'm trying to decide whether or not to dig in to the monochrome missions as some point this season. I'm really trying to gather as many perm (i.e. looping) items as I can, and if I can't take anything with me I'll probably leave it for season 3. Anybody there yet?
